items.sentence: I'm the one who recommended that you do that.
I'm happy that I was able to do that for you.
I'm going to try to do that before I go home.
I'm going to need to do that sooner or later.
I'm going to do that, but probably not today.
Tom said that he really doesn't do that much.
Tom said that he never considered doing that.
Tom said that he needs to do that by himself.
Tom said that he needed to help Mary do that.
Tom said he hopes you won't let Mary do that.
